Side Patch Data

These classes implement a side centered patch data type. These are normally used to represent flux data between patches.

  • SAMRAI::pdat::SideDataFactory
  • SAMRAI::pdat::SideData
  • SAMRAI::pdat::SideIndex
  • SAMRAI::pdat::SideIterator
